news.title: Release of PageKit 0.94
news.description: Rewrote MyPageKit, moving handler into Apache2::PageKit and site specific code into MyPageKit::Common. Model now follows the hierarchy: Apache2::PageKit::Model -> MyPageKit::Common -> User Defined Model Classes.

news.title: "Building Web Sites with Apache2::PageKit"
news.description: Article appeared in take23, discussing how Pagekit seperates the development of your site into manageable components without using embedded Perl code.
